title: 2001 African Junior Athletics Championships
text: The 2001 <a href="African%20Junior%20Athletics%20Championships">African Junior Athletics Championships</a> was the fifth edition of the biennial, continental <a href="athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> tournament for African athletes aged <a href="junior%20athletics">19 years or younger</a>. It was held in <a href="R%C3%A9duit%20%28Mauritius%29">Réduit</a>, Mauritius, from 9–12 July. A total of 41 events were contested, 21 by men and 20 by women.
